item.title: AI 2020 Roundup: AlphaFold, Tennis and Causality
item.description: Part 1 of our roundup featuring the latest and greatest AI advancements and directions from 2020. Today we cover AlphaFold’s biology breakthrough, controllable tennis videos and causality touted as the next step for AI. AlphaFold’s Winning Protein-structure Prediction Competition CASP By a Mile is AI’s Biggest Breakthrough this Year AlphaFold2, an AI program developed by DeepMind, completely blew away the competition in a protein-structure prediction competition, CASP, so much so, the co-founder of the competition has commented that “in some sense” the 50-year old problem, is solved.
